project.name: Skype Export Parser
project.catchphrase: View your current and past Skype conversations
project.description: Skype Export Parser is a third party privacy focused website which enables you to view all conversation in your Skype Export. To view them you only need to provide and upload a Skype Export. The processing and storing of data will be done localy, in your Browser and no data will be send over the internet.

steps.1: Sign in with your Microsoft / Skype Account under the Skype Export Page
steps.2: Choose Export Option wich fit your preferences
steps.2a: Conversation: Contains all messages and conversation
steps.2b: Files: Contains files, pictures, videos, video messages, voice mail, and call recordings
steps.4: Wait till the Export is finish processed by Microsoft (might take some time, depending on the amount of data)
steps.5top: Continue when the Export is finished:
steps.6: Extract all files into a new folder
steps.7: click Choose Files, choose the folder and click upload when asked, to start the parsing of the skype export

footer.disclaimer: Skype Export Parser is a hobby project and is not affiliated with Skype or Microsoft in any way.
